page.title: 12MINUTES OF TEDBURN P.C. 1/2
page.content:
Held on 13 May 1985 at the Primary School.
The acoustics of the school hall were so bad that it was difficult to follow the discussions that took place. It was proposed that a letter be sent to the LEA. {Matters arising from the Minutes: The Post Office road has been resurfaced but no work done on the drain. A councillor reported that it would be dealt with very soon. {Education:}It was suggested that pay negotiations should include a 'no-strike' clause. A councillor pointed out that this was a County Council matter - it was proposed that no action should be taken. {Post Box - Woodlands:}Attempts to provide a box were welcomed - support to be given by letter and petition.
